"input.data": valori da 4 byte

- UTF8_encoding
UCS-4 (UTF-32)  ->  UTF-8
"input.data"  ->  "UTF8.data"

- UTF8_decoding
(reverse)
"UTF8.data"  ->  "output.data"

__________________________________________________


caso 1) da 0 a 7 bit -> 1 byte in UTF-8

 · standard:
-> 0|xxxxxxx

 · min:
00000000 00000000 00000000 00000001 [1] [0x1]
-> 0|0000001

 · max:
00000000 00000000 00000000 01111111 [127] [0x7F]
-> 0|1111111


caso 2) da 8 a 11 bit -> 2 byte in UTF-8

 · standard:
-> 110|xxxxx 10|xxxxxx

 · min:
00000000 00000000 00000000 10000000 [128] [0x80]
-> 110|00010 10|000000

 · max:
00000000 00000000 00000111 11111111 [2047] [0x7FF]
-> 110|11111 10|111111


caso 3) da 12 a 16 bit -> 3 byte in UTF-8

 · standard:
-> 1110|xxxx 10|xxxxxx 10|xxxxxx

 · min:
00000000 00000000 00001000 00000000 [2048] [0x800]
-> 1110|0000 10|100000 10|000000

 · max:
00000000 00000000 11111111 11111111 [65535] [0xFFFF]
-> 1110|1111 10|111111 10|111111


caso 4) da 17 a 21 bit -> 4 byte in UTF-8

 · standard:
-> 11110|xxx 10|xxxxxx 10|xxxxxx 10|xxxxxx

 · min:
00000000 00000001 00000000 00000000 [65536] [0x10000]
-> 11110|000 10|010000 10|000000 10|000000

 · max:
00000000 00011111 11111111 11111111 [2097151] [0x1FFFFF]
-> 11110|111 10|111111 10|111111 10|111111

 · max:

-> 111110|11 10|111111 10|111111 10|111111 10|111111

caso 7) 32 bit -> 7 byte in UTF-8
